channel.title: Hanyang Petrochemical Co., Ltd.
channel.description: Recent content on Hanyang Petrochemical Co., Ltd.

item.title: About Us
item.description:
Founded in 1999, Hanyang Petrochemical Co., Ltd. is a petrochemical distribution company and an official distributor of Hanwha Solutions’ PO Division (Chemicals), supplying key polyethylene products including LDPE, LLDPE (mLLDPE), and EVA to the domestic Korean market.

With over two decades of experience in domestic distribution, we handle not only Hanwha Solutions products but also supply HDPE, PP, and other third-party or imported materials according to customer requirements.

We focus on recommending suitable materials based on application, availability, and market conditions, which is our key strength.

item.title: Ethylene Vinyl Acetate (EVA)
item.description:
Ethylene Vinyl Acetate (EVA)

EVA (Ethylene Vinyl Acetate) is a material with excellent adhesion, transparency, and processability, widely used in various industries such as films, foaming, hot melt, wires, and solar cell sheets.

item.title: Metallocene Linear Low Density Polyethylene (mLLDPE)
item.description:
Metallocene Linear Low Density Polyethylene (mLLDPE)

mLLDPE, applied with metallocene catalyst technology, offers superior tensile strength, impact strength, and optical properties compared to conventional LLDPE.

Product List

Grade M.I
(g/10min)		 Density
(g/cm³)		 Characteristics Uses TDS
M1835HN 3.5 0.916 Strength, Optical Properties, Stretchability Stretch Wrap, Cast Film
M1810HA 1.0 0.920 Strength, Heat Sealability, Low Slip Lamination Film
M1810HN 1.0 0.920 Strength, Heat Sealability, Non-Slip Lamination, General Packaging
M1810HC 1.0 0.920 Strength, High Slip General Packaging
M2710HN 1.0 0.928 Strength, Stiffness Heavy Duty Sack
M2535HN 4.0 0.925 Strength, Pressure Resistance, Moisture Permeability Diaper Film

item.title: Our Vision
item.description:
Forge the Future

Reading change and creating the future

Learn More

In an era where data and technology define competitiveness,
Hanyang reads the currents of change and drives innovation.
Through AI-based automation and IT solutions,
we grow beyond traditional distribution into a future-ready company.

Create
Value

Creating real value

Learn More

Beyond simple distribution,
we strive to deliver practical value through product, application, and supply analysis
combined with data utilization.
We aim to be a comprehensive solution partner
offering the most rational choices.

item.title: Low Density Polyethylene (LDPE)
item.description:
Low Density Polyethylene (LDPE)

LDPE is widely used in various fields such as agricultural, industrial, and packaging films due to its excellent processability and transparency.

item.title: Linear Low Density Polyethylene (LLDPE)
item.description:
Linear Low Density Polyethylene (LLDPE)

LLDPE offers superior tensile and impact strength compared to LDPE, allowing for down-gauging of films for economic benefits.

Product List

Category Grade M.I
(g/10min)		 Density
(g/cm³)		 Characteristics Uses TDS
Film 3120 1.0 0.920 Strength, Optical Properties General Packaging
3120MF 0.9 0.922 Processability, Strength, Weatherability Mulching
3123 1.0 0.924 Processability, Strength, Optical Properties Non-slip, Lamination, Heavy Duty

3127D 1.0 0.920 Optical Properties, Processability Lamination Film

item.title: High Density Polyethylene (HDPE)
item.description:
High Density Polyethylene (HDPE)

HDPE is used for various applications such as containers, pipes, and films due to its excellent strength and chemical resistance.
